messages.subject: applications
messages.msgSnippet: Hi all, I am currently preparing to fill out an application for my daughter for a page in parlement program. The first hurdle is that to get an applicaton, I
messages.messageBody:
Hi all,
I am currently preparing to fill out an application for my daughter
for a "page in parlement" program. The first hurdle is that to get
an applicaton, I was asked for her grade average as they only take
kids with high marks in school. I sent in a responce telling them that
she has no grade average as we have never done any tests. I offered a brief
resume of her learnings instead. THis responce was accecpted.
I am looking forward to recieving the application this fall and I will be trying to offer a description of her learnings of the past years. She is of an age to be in grade 7.
If anyone has gone through this process before and has any advice, I would
appreciate it.

Wendy Whitaker
